E:\M6 - Desenvolupament Web en Entorn Client\angular practica2\practica02\src\app\products\products\products.component.ts
sourcesContent: {{form.nombre}} {{form.apellido1}} import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { formService } from 'src/app/services/formServices'; @Component({ selector: 'app-products', templateUrl: './products.component.html', styleUrls: ['./products.component.css'], }) export class ProductsComponent { datos: Dato[] = []; datoName: any = ""; datoApellido1: any = ""; constructor(private FormService: formService) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.FormService.sendFormulario( this.datoName, this.datoApellido1 ).subscribe((datos: Dato[]) => { this.datos = datos; }); } } export interface Dato { nombre: string; apellido1: string; }
